law.text: For the purpose of enforcing the provisions of KRS 257.330 to 257.440, the inspectors of the Division of Animal Health shall have free access to any premises or vehicles for the purpose of inspection.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 17, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 2.
